sumosushi

In 2005 it all started in Bucharest as a small and intimate Asian restaurant that was one of the first to use the “all-you-can-eat concept” and grew into an immensely popular formula.

Today, sumosushi can be found throughout the world.

Enjoy a delicious Japanese & Asian lunch or dinner.
